author: dtsitson
body:
My task in JIRA is : [(((https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-165)))]

This is a next step after producing timing plots (first, last and isolated bunch). I made some changes to the L1TStage2uGT module for producing the denominators and some changes to L1TStage2uGTClient_cff.py for making the ratio plots for the first bunch in train, last bunch in train and isolated bunch.
title: Ratio Timing Plotsfor for L1T objects - Online DQM & L1T - CMSSW_10_0_X
